channel.title: Crystal on blog
channel.description: Recent content in Crystal on blog

item.title: The Iron Ammonite: The Deadliest place on Earth?
item.description: It's 50oC and has a humidity of 100%, less than a hundred people have been inside and it's so deadly that even with respirators and suits of ice you can only survive for 20 minutes before your body starts to fail. It’s the nearest thing to visiting another planet – it’s going deep inside our own. via ironammonite.com Brilliant account of a visit to the Giant Crystal Cave.
